backend/main.mo: Defines product, customer, cart, and order types with storage, access control, and image mappings, forming the main backend actor for product management and ordering.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to modified frontend files, associated components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their structure, purpose, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with layout-wide styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Query, Internet Identity provider, and client-side routing with authentication and admin guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and automatic query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin pages by checking admin status and showing an access-denied screen for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards pages that require authentication, prompting users to log in via Internet Identity if not signed in.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRegi: Gates children behind a customer profile check, showing a loader or registration prompt if missing.
frontend/src/components/landing/About.ts: Displays an About section with features and descriptive text explaining Farmgrew’s value.
frontend/src/components/landing/Categori: Empty file placeholder for a categories section.
frontend/src/components/landing/Category: Empty file placeholder for a category card component.
frontend/src/components/landing/DietPlan: Renders a diet-plans landing section with icons, images, and selectable plan cards sourced from dietPlans.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Provides footer layout with branding, quick navigation links, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section with marketing text, calls-to-action, and scroll/navigation helpers.
frontend/src/components/landing/Nutritio: Nutrition calculator panel with diet-plan presets, basket item editing, product add-to-cart logic, and totals computation.
frontend/src/components/landing/Recommen: Displays interactive AI-powered product recommendations based on selected goals and dietary preferences, updating automatically when a plan is chosen.
frontend/src/components/landing/ServiceA: Shows service availability with cards highlighting current coverage in Chennai and future expansion plans.
frontend/src/components/landing/TopNav.t: Implements the top navigation bar with routing, section scrolling, mobile menu handling, identity-aware actions, and cart count display.
frontend/src/components/layout/Container: Provides a responsive layout wrapper that centers content with consistent horizontal padding.
frontend/src/components/shop/CategoryFil: Renders a tab-based category selector allowing users to filter shop items by category.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Displays product details with image fallbacks and supports adding items to the cart, redirecting unauthenticated users to registration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides admin-focused product queries and mutations for listing, creating, updating, deleting, and uploading images.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Exposes cart queries and mutations to manage cart contents using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and registering customer profiles via an actor, with cache invalidation on registration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks to list orders, fetch a single order, and place new orders with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Hooks for querying products or a single product by ID through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom utilities.
frontend/src/lib/dietPlans.ts: Static definitions of several diet plans with descriptions, benefits, and focus areas.
frontend/src/lib/nutritionData.ts: Nutrition data for various foods plus a utility to calculate total nutrients for a basket of items.
frontend/src/lib/productImage.ts: Utility to derive product image URLs from product names with a fallback SVG image.
frontend/src/lib/recommendationsData.ts: Goal- and preference-based recommendation data with a function to filter and generate personalized recommendations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting products with image upload, validation, and modal dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items, allows quantity updates and removal, calculates totals, and submits orders.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Shows details of a specific order including status, items, and timestamps, with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists all user orders with status, totals, and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Handles customer registration or profile update with form submission and success confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Displays products with category filtering, loading/error states, and product grid rendering.
frontend/src/router/navigation.ts: Provides simple client-side navigation using history API and checks if a route is active.
frontend/src/router/usePathname.ts: React hook that tracks and returns the current pathname via popstate events.
frontend/src/sections/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the main landing page layout and sections, managing a selected diet plan state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theming, colors, typography, and custom utilities.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including admin UI feature requirements and access restrictions.
